tool_description: Analyzes audience characteristics, context, and expectations to provide insights for tailored speech content development.

audience_demographics.description: Demographic characteristics like age groups, professions, education levels

event_context.description: Type of event or setting (conference, wedding, corporate meeting, etc.)

audience_knowledge_level.description: Audience familiarity with topic: beginner, intermediate, advanced, mixed

cultural_considerations.description: Cultural backgrounds, traditions, or sensitivities to consider

error_messages: Invalid audience size: Must be a positive integer greater than 0
Empty demographics array: Provide at least one demographic characteristic
Invalid knowledge level: Must be one of [beginner, intermediate, advanced, mixed]
Audience demographics too vague: Provide specific demographic details rather than generic terms
usage: Provide audience size, demographics array, event context, and knowledge level. Optionally include cultural considerations for more nuanced analysis.

audience_interests.description: Predicted topics and themes that will engage this audience

attention_span_estimate.description: Expected attention span and engagement level

recommended_tone.description: Suggested overall tone for the speech
